remarks: Lemma for ~ axdc .  Using the full Axiom of Choice, we can construct a choice function ` g ` on ` ~P dom x ` .  From this, we can build a sequence ` F ` starting at any value ` s e. dom x ` by repeatedly applying ` g ` to the set ` ( F `` x ) ` (where ` x ` is the value from the previous iteration).  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Jan-2013.)
statement:
axdclem2.1 $e |- F = ( rec ( ( y e. _V |-> ( g ` { z | y x z } ) ) , s ) |` _om ) $.
axdclem2 $p |- ( E. z s x z -> ( ran x C_ dom x -> E. f A. n e. _om ( f ` n ) x ( f ` suc n ) ) ) $.
$d F f n $.
$d F n y z $.
$d f g n x $.
$d g n s y $.
$d g n x y z $.
